targets.label: Scale
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-scale-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-scale-service-fastapi' ORDER BY SUM() ASC

targets.label: Tune
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-tune-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-tune-service-fastapi' ORDER BY SUM() ASC

targets.label: Kafka
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-kafka-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'iot-mgnt-telemetry-kafka-service-consumer' ORDER BY SUM() ASC
